Class Responder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Responder
  • public class Responder
extends java.lang.Object
    The responder class represents a response generator object. It is used to generate an automatic response to an input string.
    Version:
    0.2 (2021.2.25)
    Author:
    Dalton Shults
